title: Language Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program Through Online Self-Coaching

context.prior_knowledge: Practical Experience in Language Education or Related Fields
context.additional_context: Personalized learning path design and project output production in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute personalized language proficiency development plans using online self-coaching tools within six months
Learners complete and submit two or more problem-solving projects addressing real-world language education challenges using the PBL approach
Learners build and practice feedback routines with peer learners using digital collaboration tools at least twice weekly
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
